accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Allied Building Trades Council (Rochester, NY) Records #5877. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5820 mf: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local 240 (East Rochester, NY) Minute Books on Microfilm 5821 mf: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local 72 (Rochester, NY) Minute Books on Microfilm 5822 mf: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America District Council, Rochester, NY. Records on Microfilm 5816 mf: International Bricklayers, Masons, Plasters, Tilelayers and Terrazzo Workers Local 11 (Rochester, NY) Minute Books on Microfilm 5852: Allied Building Trades Council of Rochester, NY, Minutes 6239: Rochester, New York and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO Records 6239 MB: Rochester, New York and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO Memorabilia 6239 AV: Rochester, New York and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO Audio-Visual Materials 6239 P: Rochester, New York and Vicinity Labor Council, AFL-CIO Photographs
